summary: This bill, the Public Safety Communications Act, aims to establish an Office of Public Safety Communications within the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA). This office, headed by an Associate Administrator, will oversee grant programs related to Next Generation 9-1-1, analyze public safety communication issues, advise the Assistant Secretary on public safety matters, manage the First Responder Network Authority, and oversee studies and prototyping of advanced communication technologies. The bill aims to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of public safety communications.
